name: The project 127715: Art created in The Sims 4
name_original: The project 127715: Art created in The Sims 4
description: The project 127715: Art created in The Sims 4 consists of an in-game exhibition and a catalogue of works within it. The exhibition features the artwork of sim Be Laer. According to the game rules, her painting skill is perfected to the maximum. She received the title of "Master of the Real"; other simulants are convinced of her professionalism and consider her a celebrity. The simulacrum paintings in The Sims are not projections, they are not imaginary, they create their own reality.
